name: @efchatnet/efsec
description: End-to-end encryption library using Double Ratchet and Megolm protocols

scripts.copy-wasm: mkdir -p dist/wasm/web dist/wasm/bundler dist/wasm/nodejs && if [ -d '../efsec-wasm/pkg-web' ]; then cp -r ../efsec-wasm/pkg-web/* dist/wasm/web/; fi && if [ -d '../efsec-wasm/pkg-bundler' ]; then cp -r ../efsec-wasm/pkg-bundler/* dist/wasm/bundler/; fi && if [ -d '../efsec-wasm/pkg-nodejs' ]; then cp -r ../efsec-wasm/pkg-nodejs/* dist/wasm/nodejs/; fi || cp -r ../efsec-wasm/pkg/* dist/wasm/web/
scripts.lint: echo 'Skipping ESLint - using TypeScript compiler for all validation'
scripts.lint:fix: echo 'Skipping ESLint - using TypeScript compiler for all validation'
scripts.format:check: bunx prettier --write src/ && bunx prettier --check src/
scripts.quality: bun run typecheck && bun run lint && bun run format:check
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run quality && bun run build

author: efchat.net <tj@efchat.net>
